transcripts.text: Leaders in both parties think that we should be acting as the policemen of the world.  And that we should continue to go around overthrowing and toppling dictators or countries who we don't like.  These wars are causing more suffering and costing us, the American people, trillions of dollars in the process.

You want to see Medicare for all made into law, right?  You want to see more investment in our teachers and our education systems on rebuilding our infrastructure to protect our planet.  Unless we end these regime change wars, we will not have the resources we need to serve the needs of our people and our communities right here at home.
